alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Teller (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 6:10PM MDT until July 14 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL TELLER AND SOUTHWESTERN EL PASO COUNTIES... At 609 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southwestern Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 20 mph. Another severe storm was located over Cascade also moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Colorado Springs, Fountain, Manitou Springs, Stratmoor, Fort Carson, Security, Peterson AFB, Security-Widefield, Cimarron Hills, Cascade and Chipita Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
